item.title: Christopher Asher WRAY
item.description: Christopher Asher WRAY Directeur du Bureau fédéral d’enquête Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For the sake of transparency, open letters to Mr. Wray will be published on Christopher-Asher-Wray.
